title: 2015 (S.I. No. 635 of 2015) are amended, in Regulation 4, by the substitution
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled 

Passengers Fuel Grant (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited disabled driver disabled passenger fuel grant (amendment) regulation 2024

title: 2015 (S.I. No. 635 of 2015) are amended, in Regulation 4, by the substitution
heading: 2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations 
2015 (S.I. No. 635 of 2015) are amended, in Regulation 4, by the substitution 
of the following paragraph for paragraph (2): 

“(2) Evidence that a vehicle is a vehicle on which repayment or 
remission of tax, or residual vehicle registration tax, has been 
granted in accordance with Regulation 8, 8A, 8B, 10, 10A or 
10B of the Regulations of 1994 shall be sufficient evidence for 
the purposes of these Regulations that a vehicle is a qualifying 
vehicle, unless the vehicle is sold or otherwise disposed of, or 
ceases to fulfil the criteria for relief under Regulation 8, 8A, 8B, 
10, 10A or 10B of the Regulations of 1994.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 February, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [54] 3
